P

paint(Graphics) - Method in class test.View.GameBoardView
draws ball which is called from ballview draws the power ups(life and speed) when they have not been collected displays the power up image for life when life is collected draw bricks if they have not been broken draw player by calling the player instance from player controller draws scoreboard when showscoreboard boolean is set to true
